items.content_html: NextBoard is a modern, lightweight bulletin board built with Node.js. Itâ€™s designed for simplicity, scalability, and customization, featuring modular architecture, real-time updates, and advanced tagging. Perfect for creating dynamic discussion forums for any community or project.

items.content_html: The Tode Server is a lightweight Express.js backend built with TypeScript. It processes uploaded package.json files to parse and resolve Node.js dependencies, providing structured data to the client for visualization.
